title: Typograhic tests for logotypes
content:
I have been trying to formulate a series of Typographic tests to use as a template for identity work. This is proving to be slightly more difficult than I first thought. Has anyone created something similar that they feel is a successful way of identifying fonts which work quickly?

 [‹ Minion Pro--2 glyphs with same unicode #](http://web.archive.org/web/20081123030629/http:/www.typophile.com/node/34794 "Go to previous forum topic") [thoughts at the close of 3rd ICTVC, Thessaloniki ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081123030629/http:/www.typophile.com/node/34722 "Go to next forum topic")
author: tonymcguigan
